name: Charlie's Chase
description:
This game was developed for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 in RPG Maker XP.

Buttons:

Space/C  - Interact

A - Run

S - Roll

D+Arrow - Jump

v1.1

-Fixed bug that caused enemies to crash after chasing the character.

-Fixed the bug that didn't reset the enemies' path when entering the map.

-Fixed a bug that caused the character to be able to change floors after being identified by enemies.

-Made adjustments to some maps.

Images by Krishna Palacio
